scripts.moon:build: cd .. && moon build --target js && cd graphviz && moon build --target js && cd .. && cp target/js/release/build/crdt.js target/js/release/build/crdt.d.ts web/public/ && cp graphviz/target/js/release/build/browser/browser.js web/public/graphviz.js && cp graphviz/target/js/release/build/browser/browser.d.ts web/public/graphviz.d.ts && cp target/js/release/build/moonbit.d.ts web/public/
